title: 153. HOSI, A NDZI KHONGELERI SWA MUNDZUKU

lines: LORD, FOR TOMORROW AND ITS NEED
1. Hosi A Ndzi Khongeleri Swa Mundzuku, Ndzi Ponise Evudyohweni Namuntlha; Ndzi Nga Ku Dyoheri Hi Ririmi Ranga;
Na Hinkwaswo Leswi Ndzi Swi Hleketaka.
2. Ndzi Rhandza Ku Ku Tirhela Ndzi Khongela, Ndzi Ta Hanya Hi Tintswalo Swa Namuntlha;
Ndzi Nyike Matimba Ya Ku Ku Yingisa, Ndza Tinyiketa Ka Wena Ko Namuntlha.
3. Loko Swi Nga Endleka Ndzi Fa Namuntlha, Switshembiso Swa Wena Swi Va Ka Mina; A Ndzi Na Ku Khongotela Swa Mundzuku,
Ndzi Letele Wena Hosi Swa Namuntlha.
